text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a LOC

name: ParticipationTargetLocation
title: ParticipationTargetLocation
description: The facility where the service is done. May be a static building (or room therein) or a moving location (e.g., ambulance, helicopter, aircraft, train, truck, ship, etc.)
